problem.title: Write a code to get the input in the given format and print the output in the given format.
problem.input_Description: A single line contains a string.
problem.output_Description: Print the characters in a string separated by comma.

problem.title: Write a code to get the input in the given format and print the output in the given format
Write a code to get the input in the given format and print the output in the given format
problem.input_Description: A single line contains integers separated by space
problem.output_Description: Print the integer list of integers separated by space

problem.title: Write a code to get the input in the given format and print the output in the given format.
problem.input_Description: First-line indicates two integers which are the size of array and 'K' value. Second-line indicates an integer contains elements of an array.
problem.output_Description: Print the taken input in the same format.

problem.title: Write a code to get the input in the given format and print the output in the given format
problem.input_Description: First-line indicates two integers separated by space. Second-line indicates two integers separated by space. Third-line indicates two integers separated by space.
problem.output_Description: Print the input in the same format.

problem.title: Write a code get an integer number as input and print the odd and even digits of the number separately.
problem.input_Description: A single line containing an integer.
problem.output_Description: Print the even and odd integers of the integer in a separate line.

problem.title: Using the method of looping, write a program to print the table of 9 till N in the format as follows: (N is input by the user) 9 1 8 2 7... Print NULL if 0 is input
problem.input_Description: A positive integer is provided as an input.
problem.output_Description: Print the table of nine with single space between the elements till the number that is input.

problem.title: Write a code to get an integer N and print the values from N to 1
problem.input_Description: A single line contains an integer N.
problem.output_Description: Print the values from N to 1 in a separate line.

problem.title: Write a code to get an integer N and print the even values from 1 till N in a separate line.
problem.input_Description: A single line contains an integer N.
problem.output_Description: Print the even values from 1 to N in a separate line.

problem.title: Write a code to get 2 integers A and N. Print the integer A, N times in separate line.
problem.input_Description: First line contains an integer A. Second line contains an Integer N.
problem.output_Description: Print the integer A, N times in a separate line.

problem.title: you are given with array of numbers.you have to find whether array is beautiful or not. A beautiful array is an array whose sum of all numbers is divisible by 2, 3 and 5
problem.input_Description: You are given a number ‘n’ denoting the size of array.Next line contains n space separated numbers.
problem.output_Description: Print 1 if array is beautiful and 0 if it is not

problem.title: You are given with two arrays. Your task is to merge the array such that first array is in ascending order and second one in descending order.
problem.input_Description: First line contains two integer ‘n’ and ‘m’. ‘n’ denotes length of array 1 and ‘m’ of array 2.Next line contains n space separated numbers and third line contains ‘m’ space separated numbers
problem.output_Description: Print a single array in desired order

problem.title: You are given with an array. For each element present in the array your task is to print the next smallest than that number. If it is not smallest print -1
problem.input_Description: You are given a number ‘n’ representing size of array. And n space separated numbers.
problem.output_Description: Print the next smallest number present in array and -1 if no smallest is present

problem.title: A person saves his monthly saving according to given schema. He saves same amount of money which is equal to the money saved in immediate previous two months. Assume, initially he saved 1000 rupees and in first month he saved another 1000. Your task is to tell how much he had totally saved at the end of ‘n’ months
problem.input_Description: You will be given a number ‘n’->No. of months
problem.output_Description: Print the total savings at the end of ‘n’ months

problem.title: You are given a number with duplicate digits your task is to remove the immediate duplicate digits and print the result
problem.input_Description: You are given a long string of digits
problem.output_Description: Print the desired result print -1 if result length is 0
